scripts.deploy:avax: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ traderjoe-xyz/stablejoe stablejoe.avax.yaml
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ traderjoe-xyz/sjoe-rinkeby stablejoe.rinkeby.yaml
scripts.deploy-local: graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --access-token traderjoe-xyz/stablejoe stablejoe.fuji.yaml
